--- In gladiator@y..., insanerest@a... wrote:
> Does this mean that a tournament is a likelyhood?

Once 15 people complete either poll about a tournament, I will create 
a specific yahoo group to deal with issues relating to the tournament 
and put a requirement that everyone in the tournament group be in 
this group.  Issues like the rules, criteria for choosing scenarios 
(if the poll leans a certain way) will be discussed.

As a reminder notice, I am looking for 15 people to show interest by 
completing some polls.  If lurkers out there say to yourselves 'I'll 
participate in a tournament when I know more specifics', I reply that 
no specifics will be discussed until enough people show interest.

BTW, if anyone wants to argue the point about how few people it takes 
to have a decent tournament, I have an open mind.
